meaningMnemonic: This <radical>cage</radical> is full of <radical>flowers</radical> on the <radical>right</radical> side to <kanji>hide</kanji> the fact that you're in here too.
readingMnemonic: As you <kanji>hide</kanji> the ghost of <reading>Toku</reading>gawa (とく) Ieyasu appears before you, inside the cage! His arms are crossed and he's shaking his head at you. "Do you think I managed to become the first shougun of Japan by hiding?"
